member.name: T:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastResult
member.summary: A single BLAST search result. This is represented by a single XML document in BLAST XML format. It consist of some introductory information such as BLAST version, a structure listing the search parameters, and a list of Iterations (represented in the BlastSearchRecord class).

member.name: M:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastResult.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.summary: The summary data for the search

member.summary: The list of BlastSearchRecords in the document.

member.name: T:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastSearchRecord
member.summary: A single result from a sequence search, such as any of the various flavors of BLAST. This is referred to as an Iteration in the BLAST XML schema; some flavors (such as PSI-BLAST) can combine multiple iterations into one XML document.

member.name: M:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastSearchRecord.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: T:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastXmlParser
member.summary: Parse text containing XML BLAST results into a list of SequenceSearchRecord objects.

member.name: T:Bio.Web.Blast.IBlastParser
member.summary: This interface defines the contract that has to be implemented by a class that parse an output from blast service. Blast service can be in different format e.g., text / xml

member.name: M:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastXmlParser.ParseXML(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: This method expects a single XML document and returns one BlastResult.
member.param: A Stringbuilder containing the XML document.

member.name: M:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastXmlParser.Parse(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read XML BLAST data from the reader, and build one or more BlastRecordGroup objects (each containing one or more BlastSearchRecord results).
member.param: The stream to pull the data from
member.returns: A list of BLAST iteration objects

member.summary: Parse a single entity from the given stream.
member.param: The stream to pull data from

member.summary: Reads next line considering

member.summary: Gets the name of the parser being implemented. This is intended to give the developer name of the parser.

member.name: P:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastXmlParser.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the parser being implemented. This is intended to give the developer some information of the parser.

member.name: P:Bio.Web.Blast.BlastXmlParser.SupportedFileTypes
member.summary: Gets the file extensions that the parser supports. If multiple extensions are supported then this property will return a string containing all extensions with a ',' delimited.

member.name: T:Bio.Web.Selectome.SelectomeGene
member.summary:
A class that represents the data available for a given gene in the selectome database http://selectome.unil.ch/ The data is provided as a DAS server, http://www.biodas.org/wiki/Main_Page, and this class obtains this data from the xml.
Currently only provides data from the vertebrate branch, as this uses the most information..
